materials.raw_text:
- Oxygen (O): 0.20 g
- Selenium (Se): 0.30 g
- Terbium (Tb): 1.50 g
- Additional additives (if necessary, e.g., binder or flux): 0.10 g

sourcing.instructions:
- Oxygen: Obtain from compressed gas suppliers or chemical supply companies.
- Selenium: Available at chemical supply stores or online chemical retailers.
- Terbium: Source from rare earth material suppliers or specialized chemical vendors.
- Additives: Local craft stores or online suppliers of binding agents.
